document.docAuthor: Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail, Akkari, Nesrine & Zapparoli, Marzio
document.masterDocTitle: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

subSubSection.paragraph:
( 2 )
Scolopendra penetrans C.L. Koch
: C.L. Koch, 1863 : 69 , Fig. 192 .

( 4 )
Sc. cingulata Latreille
var. coeruleolimbata
Verhoeff, 1901
: 430
, 453.

General distribution. Europe: Albania , Bosnia Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Cyprus , France , FYR Macedonia , Greece , Hungary , Italy (incl. Sicily), Malta , Moldova , Montenegro , Portugal , Romania , Serbia , Slovenia , Spain , Ukraine . West Asia: Caucasus, Iran , Israel , Jordan , Lebanon , Palestine , Syria , Tadjikistan , Turkey . North Africa: Algeria , Egypt , Libya , Morocco , Tunisia (
Zapparoli 2002
; Minelli et al. 2006 ).

New records from Mt. Parnonas (
Fig. 9

New records from Peloponnisos (
Fig. 9
). 3 exx., Ahaia, Mt Aroania, Sky Center, 1700 m ,
19 May 2004
, G. Osella; 2 exx., Argolida, Mt. Didimon, 1100 m ,
20 May 2004
, G. Osella; 2 exx., Ilia, Neohori, 40 m ,
N 37.51792
/
E 21.61389
,
20 Apr. 2003
, P. Cerretti.

Ecological notes. 0–2350 m ; a thermophilous species, in mesothermophilous broadleaved woods (
Quercus
sp.,
Castanea sativa
,
Populus
sp.), in
Abies cephalonica
woods, in Mediterranean phrygana, in dunes, in
Paliurus spinachristi
,
Quercus coccifera
,
Juniperus
sp., and
Laurus nobilis
scrubs, in anthropized habitats, in agroecosystems, and in coastal habitats (
Verhoeff 1901
;
Dobroruka 1965
; Zapparoli 1994 , 1996 ).
